SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
Declare @Periodo INT, @Fecha_Primer_Dia_Proceso Datetime SET @Periodo = (select max(id_periodo) from AUX_PERIODO_MES_BORRA) SET @Fecha_Primer_Dia_Proceso = (select min(id_fecha) from D_FECHA where id_periodo = @Periodo)
----- Deezeer, DOC24 y Hockey Insert into AUX_H_ORD_AMB_DET (id_periodo , id_posicion , id_tipo_orden , nro_orden , id_prestacion , id_posicion_barra , nro_cursograma , fecha_recepcion , fecha_prestacion , fecha_cierre , id_origen_prestacion , afiliado , subnumero , secuencia , id_persona , edad_orden , id_producto , id_subproducto , id_plan_producto , id_acreedor , id_provision_prest , id_profesional , id_posicion_auditor , id_reintegro , id_no_facturador , cant_prest_amb_recon , imp_prest_amb_recon , cant_prest_amb_acep , imp_prest_amb_acep , cant_prest_amb_pag , imp_pret_amb_pag , id_provision , id_prof_prescr , id_programa_especial , id_monodroga , id_tipo_reintegro , id_tipo_carga , id_marca_valorizacion , id_tipo_refacturacion , id_tipo_papel , id_posicion_emision , grilla , id_tipo_profesional_preescribiente , id_Tipo_Prestador , id_categoria , Nro_Lote , fecha_ingreso_segmento , id_persona_empresa , id_tipo_orden_relacionada , id_orden_relacionada , cant_prest_amb_fact , imp_prest_amb_fact , imp_iva_amb_pag , id_posicion_prestacion , id_plan_producto_historico , id_capita , odontologia_pieza , odontologia_cara_M , odontologia_cara_V , odontologia_cara_P , odontologia_cara_D , odontologia_cara_I_O , id_rango_edad_cons , id_marca_normal_patologica , id_consumo_subsid_supra)
select Periodo as id_periodo, 999 as id_posicion , tipo_orden as id_tipo_orden , 0 as nro_orden , (CASE when CODIGO in ('00000024') and TN = 'NA' then 'NA00000024' when CODIGO in ('00000025') and TN = 'NA' then 'NA00000025' else 'NA00000026' end) as id_prestacion , 999 as id_posicion_barra , 0 as nro_cursograma , @Fecha_Primer_Dia_Proceso as fecha_recepcion , @Fecha_Primer_Dia_Proceso as fecha_prestacion , @Fecha_Primer_Dia_Proceso as fecha_cierre , origen as id_origen_prestacion , cuenta as afiliado , subcuenta as subnumero , A.secuencia , persona as id_persona, edad_periodo, id_producto, id_subproducto , id_plan_producto , (CASE when CODIGO in ('00000024') and TN = 'NA' then 41278 when CODIGO in ('00000025') and TN = 'NA' then 626445 else 0 end) as id_acreedor , 999 as id_provision_prest, 0 as id_profesional , 999 as id_posicion_auditor , 'A' as id_reintegro , 99999 as id_no_facturador , 1 as cant_prest_amb_recon , importe as imp_prest_amb_recon , 1 as cant_prest_amb_acep , importe as imp_prest_amb_acep , 1 as cant_prest_amb_pag , importe as imp_pret_amb_pag , provision as id_provision , 99999 as id_prof_prescr , '' as id_programa_especial , 99999 as id_monodroga , 'X' as id_tipo_reintegro , 'N' as id_tipo_carga , 'P' as id_marca_valorizacion , 'N' as id_tipo_refacturacion , 'O' as id_tipo_papel , 999 as id_posicion_emision , 0 as grilla , 'P' as id_tipo_profesional_preescribiente , 'P' as id_Tipo_Prestador , '' as id_categoria , 0 as Nro_Lote , '' as fecha_ingreso_segmento , '' as id_persona_empresa , 999 as id_tipo_orden_relacionada , 0 as id_orden_relacionada , 0 as cant_prest_amb_fact , 0 as imp_prest_amb_fact , 0 as imp_iva_amb_pag, 999 as id_posicion_prestacion, id_plan_producto as id_plan_producto_historico, 0 as id_capita, 99 as id_pieza_dental, 'N' as id_cara_M, 'N' as id_cara_v, 'N' as id_cara_P, 'N' as id_cara_D, 'N' as id_cara_i_o, 0 as id_rango_edad_cons, ' ' as id_marca_normal_patologica, 'N' as id_consumo_subsid_supra from consultas_dw.dbo.AUX_H_ORD_AMB_DET_DEEZER_DOC24 A inner join H_COMER_STOCK_AFILIA H ON H.id_periodo = A.Periodo and A.persona = H.id_persona and afiliado = cuenta and subcuenta = H.subnumero and A.Secuencia = A.Secuencia where H.id_periodo = @Periodo group by Periodo , CODIGO, TN, tipo_orden , origen , cuenta , subcuenta , A.secuencia , persona , edad_periodo, id_producto, id_subproducto , id_plan_producto , importe , provision

property.description: Indicates whether the values supplied for identity columns will be copied to the destination. If false, values for identity columns will be auto-generated at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepIdentity

property.description: Indicates whether the columns containing null will have null inserted in the destination. If false, columns containing null will have their default values inserted at the destinaton. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepNulls

property.description: Specifies options to be used with fast load. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadOptions

property.description: Specifies when commits are issued during data insertion. A value of 0 specifies that one commit will be issued at the end of data insertion. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadMaxInsertCommitSize

component.contactInfo: OLE DB Destination;Microsoft Corporation;Microsoft SqlServer v9; (C) 2005 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved; http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support;4
component.name: OLE DB Destination

property.description: The number of seconds before a command times out. A value of 0 indicates an infinite time-out.
property.name: CommandTimeout

property.description: Specifies the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowset

property.description: Specifies the variable that contains the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowsetVariable

property.description: The SQL command to be executed.
property.name: SqlCommand

property.description: Specifies the column code page to use when code page information is unavailable from the data source.
property.name: DefaultCodePage

property.description: Forces the use of the DefaultCodePage property value when describing character data.
property.name: AlwaysUseDefaultCodePage

property.description: Specifies the mode used to access the database.
property.name: AccessMode

property.description: Indicates whether the values supplied for identity columns will be copied to the destination. If false, values for identity columns will be auto-generated at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepIdentity

property.description: Indicates whether the columns containing null will have null inserted in the destination. If false, columns containing null will have their default values inserted at the destinaton. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepNulls

property.description: Specifies options to be used with fast load. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadOptions

property.description: Specifies when commits are issued during data insertion. A value of 0 specifies that one commit will be issued at the end of data insertion. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadMaxInsertCommitSize

component.name: OLE DB Destination

property.description: The number of seconds before a command times out. A value of 0 indicates an infinite time-out.
property.name: CommandTimeout

property.description: Specifies the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowset

property.description: Specifies the variable that contains the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowsetVariable

property.description: The SQL command to be executed.
property.name: SqlCommand

property.description: Specifies the column code page to use when code page information is unavailable from the data source.
property.name: DefaultCodePage

property.description: Forces the use of the DefaultCodePage property value when describing character data.
property.name: AlwaysUseDefaultCodePage

property.description: Specifies the mode used to access the database.
property.name: AccessMode

property.description: Indicates whether the values supplied for identity columns will be copied to the destination. If false, values for identity columns will be auto-generated at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepIdentity

property.description: Indicates whether the columns containing null will have null inserted in the destination. If false, columns containing null will have their default values inserted at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepNulls

property.description: Specifies options to be used with fast load. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadOptions

property.description: Specifies when commits are issued during data insertion. A value of 0 specifies that one commit will be issued at the end of data insertion. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadMaxInsertCommitSize
